subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Lexical sets and QS letters
msgSnippet: ... This is a very good article and I wished I had read it earlier. I just got around to reading it tonight. It not only summarizes the important mergers, but
messageBody:
Anthony Grahn wrote:

> Much of what we are doing is discussed at:
>
> http://www.phon.ucl.ac.uk/home/wells/accents_spellingreform.htm
> <http://www.phon.ucl.ac.uk/home/wells/accents_spellingreform.htm>

This is a very good article and I wished I had read it earlier. I just
got around to reading it tonight. It not only summarizes the important
mergers, but explains what groups they affect, and how much of a problem
they might present.

Paul
